name: IUpdateItemEvent

properties.name: mapper
properties.description: A function to call whenever an item is updated. Allows to read or modify the object attached to the updated item, e.g. to set a flag on the object.
properties.rawdescription:
A function to call whenever an item is updated.
Allows to read or modify the object attached to the updated item,
e.g. to set a flag on the object.

properties.name: object
properties.description: Object refering to the item that is to be updated
properties.rawdescription: Object refering to the item that is to be updated

properties.name: template
properties.description: Allows to define a template that will be rendered next to the item option label.
properties.rawdescription: Allows to define a template that will be rendered next to the item option label.

description: Use event to trigger an update on a select modal entry.
rawdescription: Use event to trigger an update on a select modal entry.
